subject: Automobile Racing
Children and Youth
Parenting
lead_paragraph: Many children begin go-karting as early as age 3. Macy Causey, a second grader in Seaford, Va., is starting with Bandolero racing.
snippet: Many children begin go-karting as early as age 3. Macy Causey, a second grader in Seaford, Va., is starting with Bandolero racing.
